ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh yes well the shaman form of the spell is a lot more efficent then the mana stone. The necro form of it is the best in the game the level 34 spell for it
ygData.messageBody:
Heh yes well the shaman form of the spell is a lot more efficent then the
mana stone. The necro form of it is the best in the game the level 34 spell
for it trades 15hp for 15mana. The manastone is not that efficent at all.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Lonnie Lewis <LLewis@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 10:52 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..

>

>> is

>>
>> Which allows you to trade 3 hp for one mana point. Unless you have regen
>> or a paladin topped up on mana to heal the person using it, it's
>> useless.
>>
> Don't forget a bard to heal :) I had a shaman using a spell similar
>to that last night. The first time he did it, we were all a bit scared
when
>we saw his hps go from full to one bubble real quickly.
>
>
> Bien
